tika-vin10t2:6: Chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ, paṭiseveyya yā pana;
tika-vin10t2:7: Hoti pārājikā nāma, samaṇī sā pavuccati.
tika-vin10t2:19: Sarīrakena ce tena, phuseyya bhikkhunī pana.
tika-vin10t2:22: Sarīramassa tena vā, phuṭṭhā pārājikā siyā.
tika-vin10t2:30: Avasesena vā tassa, kāyaṃ kāyena attano;
tika-vin10t2:31: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassā, payoge purisassa ca.
tika-vin10t2:37: Avasese ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:40: Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi, gataṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:42: Kelāyati sace bhikkhu, saddhiṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:48: Bhikkhuno methuno rāgo, gehapemampi vā bhave;
tika-vin10t2:49: Tassā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:51: Ubhinnaṃ methune rāge, gehapemepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t2:54: Yassa yattha manosuddhaṃ, tassa tattha na dosatā;
tika-vin10t2:58: Pacchā dūseti ce neva, hoti bhikkhunidūsako.
tika-vin10t2:61: Niccalo hoti ce bhikkhu, na hotāpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t2:63: Bhikkhunī bhikkhunā phuṭṭhā, sace hotipi niccalā;
tika-vin10t2:69: Tassā kriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sati na dissati;
tika-vin10t2:79: Pārājikattaṃ jānanti, saliṅge tu ṭhitāya hi;
tika-vin10t2:82: Dhure nikkhittamattasmiṃ, sā ca pārājikā siyā;
tika-vin10t2:86: Viseso tatra pācitti, idha pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:90: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko ca so tassā, diṭṭhiyā gahaṇena taṃ.
tika-vin10t2:92: Anuvatteyya yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī sā visumpi ca;
tika-vin10t2:95: Acajantīva taṃ vatthuṃ, gahetvā yadi tiṭṭhati;
tika-vin10t2:99: Puna appaṭisandheyā, dvidhā bhinnā silā viya.
tika-vin10t2:114: Sallapeyya tathā tattha, ṭhatvā tu purisena vā;
tika-vin10t2:115: Saṅketaṃ vāpi gaccheyya, iccheyyā gamanassa vā.
tika-vin10t2:118: Upasaṃhareyya kāyaṃ vā, hatthapāse ṭhitā pana.
tika-vin10t2:123: Anulomena vā vatthuṃ, paṭilomena vā cutā;
tika-vin10t2:126: Athādito panekaṃ vā, dve vā tīṇipi satta vā;
tika-vin10t2:155: Sakkhiṃ vāpi sahāyaṃ vā, pariyesati dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:156: Pade pade tathā aṭṭaṃ, kātuṃ gacchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t2:158: Āroceti sace pubbaṃ, bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:159: Disvā vohārikaṃ tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:161: Āroceti sace pacchā, itaro attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:164: Ārocetitaro pubbaṃ, sace so attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:174: Vinicchaye kate tehi, aṭṭe pana ca niṭṭhite.
tika-vin10t2:179: Dūtaṃ vāpi pahiṇitvā, āgantvāna sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t2:182: Ārāme pana aññehi, anācāraṃ kataṃ sace;
tika-vin10t2:183: Anodissa paraṃ kiñci, rakkhaṃ yācati tattha yā.
tika-vin10t2:185: Yāya kiñci avuttāva, dhammaṭṭhā sayameva tu;
tika-vin10t2:186: Sutvā taṃ aññato aṭṭaṃ, niṭṭhāpenti sace pana.
tika-vin10t2:192: Jānantī bhikkhunī coriṃ, vajjhaṃ viditameva yā;
tika-vin10t2:204: Vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā coriṃ, ṭhapetvā kappamevidaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:207: Sammannati ca sīmaṃ vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:208: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi ca dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:211: Gaṇo ācarinī ceva, na ca muccati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:214: Kappaṃ vā apaloketvā, tassā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t2:221: Ohīyeyya gaṇamhā vā, rattiṃ vippavaseyya vā.
tika-vin10t2:226: Nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:235: Nikkhamitvā sace pacchā, sakaṃ gāmaṃ visantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:236: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, vaticchiddena vā tathā.
tika-vin10t2:239: Kappiyanti paviṭṭhattā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t2:241: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihārassa, bhūmi tāsaṃ tu kappiyā;
tika-vin10t2:247: Yaṃ kiñci sakagāmaṃ vā, paragāmampi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t2:251: Pāraṃ gacchati yā tīraṃ, tassā samaṇiyā pana.
tika-vin10t2:262: Nhāyituṃ pivituṃ vāpi, otiṇṇātha nadiṃ puna;
tika-vin10t2:268: Setunā upagantvā vā, yānākāsehi vā sace;
tika-vin10t2:269: Yāti uttaraṇe kāle, padasā garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t2:274: Piṭṭhiyaṃ vā nisīditvā, khandhe vā uttarantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:284: Na doso dutiyā pāsaṃ, uṭṭheti aruṇaṃ sace.
tika-vin10t2:287: Gāmato bahi nikkhamma, tassā dutiyikāya tu.
tika-vin10t2:307: Dvinnaṃ maggaṃ gacchantīnaṃ, ekā gantuṃ no sakkoti;
tika-vin10t2:311: Hoti tassāpi āpatti, saussāhā na hoti ce.
tika-vin10t2:313: Gacchantīsu tathā dvīsu, purimā yāti ekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:314: Aññaṃ pana sace maggaṃ, pacchimāpi ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t2:325: Pakkantā vāpi vibbhantā, yātā petānaṃ lokaṃ vā;
tika-vin10t2:326: Pakkhasaṅkantā vā naṭṭhā, saddhiṃ yātā sā ce hoti.
tika-vin10t2:332: Agāmake araññe tu, gaṇā ohīyanaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t2:335: Cattāropi ca saṅghādi-sesā tassā na vijjare.
tika-vin10t2:342: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi, honti thullaccayā duve.
tika-vin10t2:347: Pucchitvā kārakaṃ saṅghaṃ, chandaṃ datvā gaṇassa vā;
tika-vin10t2:348: Vatte vā pana vattantiṃ, asante kārakepi vā.
tika-vin10t2:350: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ukkhittaṃ, yā osāreti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t2:372: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, sabbatthāpi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:375: ‘‘Avassuto na cāya’’nti, ñatvā gaṇhati yā pana.
tika-vin10t2:393: ‘‘Nāvassuto’’ti ñatvā vā, kupitā vā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t2:394: Kulānuddayatā vāpi, uyyojeti ca yā pana.
tika-vin10t2:404: Navame dasame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:409: Yāvatatiyakā aṭṭha, cattāri ca ito tato.
tika-vin10t2:426: Akāle cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, dinnaṃ kālepi kenaci;
tika-vin10t2:430: Bhājāpeyya ca yā tassā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:432: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ yaṃ, taṃ tu nissaggiyaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t2:435: Katvā vinayakammaṃ tu, paṭiladdhampi taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t2:436: Tassa cāyamadhippāyo, sevituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t2:449: Itaresu ca vatthūnaṃ, payogassa vasā siyā.
tika-vin10t2:454: Tāya vā dīyamānaṃ tu, tassā vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t2:464: Tasmiṃ taññeva vā aññaṃ, aññenatthepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t2:471: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā pubbaṃ, pacchā aññaṃ cetāpeyya;
tika-vin10t2:472: Evaṃ saññāyaññaṃ dhaññaṃ, mayhaṃ ānetvā detīti.
tika-vin10t2:475: Lābhe nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tena caññena vābhataṃ.
tika-vin10t2:484: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, lābhe, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t2:494: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:505: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:519: Tato ce uttariṃ yaṃ tu, cetāpeti hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t2:533: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi khādati;
tika-vin10t2:536: Dve tayo bhaṇḍike saddhiṃ, saṅkhāditvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t2:537: Ajjhoharati yā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:539: Bhinditvā tattha ekekaṃ, miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:548: Ekā miñjā palaṇḍussa, bhañjanassa duve siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t2:561: Na doso sati ābādhe, lomake saṃharantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:568: Gaṇḍaṃ tattha vaṇaṃ vāpi, na doso paharantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:579: Pavesāpeti vā tasmiṃ, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:591: Catunnaṃ vāpi tissannaṃ, ekapabbampi yā pana;
tika-vin10t2:604: Bhuñjato pana bhikkhussa, pānīyaṃ vā vidhūpanaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:614: Khādato khādanaṃ vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:616: Na doso deti dāpeti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t2:620: Viññatvā āmakaṃ dhaññaṃ, bhajjitvā yadi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t2:621: Koṭṭetvā ca pacitvā ca, pācitti paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t2:623: Na kevalaṃ tu dhaññānaṃ, gahaṇeyeva dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:624: Haraṇepi ca dhaññānaṃ, tathā sukkhāpane pana.
tika-vin10t2:633: Viññatvā vā sayaṃ tasmā, bhajjanādīni aññato.
tika-vin10t2:636: Kārāpetvāpi katvā vā, ajjhoharati yā pana.
tika-vin10t2:641: Bhajjanādīni katvā vā, kārāpetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t2:644: Viññattiyā panaññāya, laddhaṃ tāya sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t2:651: Ñātakānampi dhaññaṃ tu, āmakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t2:657: Uccāraṃ vāpi passāvaṃ, saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsakaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:658: Chaḍḍeyya vā tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t2:660: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, pākārepi ayaṃ nayo;
tika-vin10t2:669: Sabbattha pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:670: Avalañjepi vā ṭhāne, oloketvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t2:676: Khette vā nāḷikerādi-ārāme vāpi yā pana;
tika-vin10t2:679: Tāni cattāri vatthūni, sace chaḍḍeti vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:682: Bhuñjamānā nisīditvā, khette tu harite tathā;
tika-vin10t2:683: Ucchuādīni khādantī, gacchantī pana tattha yā.
tika-vin10t2:685: Chaḍḍeti yadi ucchiṭṭhaṃ, udakaṃ calakāni vā;
tika-vin10t2:686: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:692: Na uṭṭhetaṅkuraṃ yāva, sabbesaṃ tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:694: Lāyitampi manussānaṃ, khettaṃ rakkhati ce puna;
tika-vin10t2:697: Na doso chaḍḍite khette, sabbaṃ chaḍḍentiyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:701: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t2:708: Suṇāti tesaṃ gītampi, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t2:710: Aññasmimpi disābhāge, naccaṃ passati ce pana;
tika-vin10t2:711: Suṇāti aññato gītaṃ, visuṃ pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t2:714: Naccituṃ gāyituṃ neva, sayaṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t2:716: ‘‘Aññaṃ naccāti vādehi’’, iti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t2:719: Tassā pācitti sabbattha, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:723: Ārāmeyeva ṭhatvā vā, yā passati suṇāti vā.
tika-vin10t2:725: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, āgantvā ca payojitaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:726: Gantvā passantiyā vāpi, tathārūpā hi kāraṇā.
tika-vin10t2:728: Passantiyā tathā maggaṃ, naccaṃ paṭipathepi ca;
tika-vin10t2:737: Santiṭṭhati sace saddhiṃ, purisena ca bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t2:739: Tassā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, saddhiṃ vā sallapantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:742: Hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā vā, purisassa sace pana;
tika-vin10t2:745: Santiṭṭhati ca yā tassā, dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:746: Anāpatti sace koci, dutiyā viññu vijjati.
tika-vin10t2:753: Adhikaṃ itaraṃ sabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t2:763: Atikkameti yā, hoti, dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pade;
tika-vin10t2:764: Dutiye ca pade tassā, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t2:780: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ tulyaṃ, aṭṭhame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:798: Dvīsu tesu panekekaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu karontiyā.
tika-vin10t2:814: Dutiye pana vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:819: Anantarāya taṃ pacchā, yā na sibbeyya bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t2:824: Pacchā sibbati pācitti, nikkhipitvā dhuraṃ sace;
tika-vin10t2:837: Ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā, pañca pañcasu dīpitā;
tika-vin10t2:857: Yā hi bhikkhuni saṅghassa, labhitabbaṃ tu cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t2:860: Gaṇassāpi ca ekissā, lābhe āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:883: Gaṇanāya vasenettha, cīvarānaṃ tu tā pana;
tika-vin10t2:894: Ubhosu kaṅkhitāya vā, avoca dukkaṭaṃ jino.
tika-vin10t2:912: Sesaṃ pana asesena, sattamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:917: Ekāya tu nipannāya, aparā vā nipajjatu;
tika-vin10t2:918: Nipajjeyyuṃ saheva dve, dvinnaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:921: Ekāya ca nipannāya, sace ekā nisīdati.
tika-vin10t2:923: Ubho vāpi nisīdanti, samaṃ, ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t2:930: Nipajjanti saheva dve, tāsaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t2:931: Ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ dvinnaṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:948: Na ca aphāsukāmāya, āpucchā purato pana;
tika-vin10t2:966: Sayaṃ upassayā tamhā, nikkaḍḍhati sace pana.
tika-vin10t2:969: Taṃ nikkaḍḍhantiyā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:984: Chaṭṭhe panidha vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:994: Na doso saha satthena, khemaṭṭhānāpadāsu vā;
tika-vin10t2:998: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, anuttānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin10t2:1003: Katvā ca dhuranikkhepaṃ, pacchā gacchantiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t2:1006: Chasu vattabbamevatthi, kinnu nāmidha taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1008: Tīṇi gantvā ca teneva, paccāgantuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t2:1025: Niddiṭṭhaṃ muninā tāsaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade;
tika-vin10t2:1029: Gantvā passanti ce taṃ taṃ, pāṭekkāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1032: Bhikkhussa pana sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1038: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā, māṇanātītaṃ vāḷūpetaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1050: Channaṃ aññataraṃ suttaṃ, yadi kantati bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t2:1051: Yattakaṃ añchitaṃ hatthā, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
tika-vin10t2:1056: Na doso kantitaṃ suttaṃ, puna kantantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:1060: Koṭṭanaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ tu, ādiṃ katvāna dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1067: Kiñci kammaṃ akāretvā, kiñci kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t2:1069: Saṅghassa yāgupāne vā, saṅghabhattepi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t2:1072: Attano ca anāpatti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t2:1077: Tathā idha panekāhaṃ, parihāro na labbhati.
tika-vin10t2:1084: Gihīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, dantaponodakaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t2:1086: Ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ aññaṃ, aññesaṃ tu dadāti yā;
tika-vin10t2:1090: Yā na deti ca dāpeti, nikkhamitvāpi dentiyā.
tika-vin10t2:1092: Deti bāhiralepaṃ vā, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t2:1097: Divase tu catutthe taṃ, dhovitvā puna cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1102: Tassā nissajjite tasmiṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1103: Utunīnaṃ abhāve tu, aññāsaṃ puna pariyaye.
tika-vin10t2:1112: Attano gāmato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t2:1128: Pariyāpuṇeyya ce kiñci, yassa kassaci santike;
tika-vin10t2:1131: Lekhe pana anāpatti, dhāraṇāya ca guttiyā;
tika-vin10t2:1132: Parittesu ca sabbesu, tathā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t2:1135: Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ, navamena samaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1147: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1150: Jātakaṅkhāya vā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1153: Tā sannipatitā yattha, tāsaṃ gacchati santikaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1162: Akkoseyya ca yā bhikkhuṃ, paribhāseyya vā pana;
tika-vin10t2:1171: Yā saṅghaṃ paribhāseyya, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t2:1172: Ekaṃ sambahulā vāpi, tatheva itarāya vā.
tika-vin10t2:1178: Nimantitāpi vā sace, pavāritāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t2:1182: Yā cajjhoharaṇatthāya, yaṃ kiñci pana āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1184: Paṭiggaṇhāti ce tassā, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t2:1195: Kālikāni ca tīṇeva, paccaye sati bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t2:1199: Nimantitā anāpucchā, sāmiṃ bhuñjati ce pana.
tika-vin10t2:1201: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, akāretvāpi vā yadi;
tika-vin10t2:1202: Paribhuñjati yā tassā, pācitti kriyato siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1208: Santaṃ bhāsantiyā dosaṃ, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t2:1213: Na vasati sace maggo, akhemo vā sace siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1215: Ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma, āvāso pana tattha hi;
tika-vin10t2:1218: Pakkantā pakkhasaṅkantā, vibbhantā vā matāpi vā;
tika-vin10t2:1233: Pariyesitvāpi vā bhikkhuṃ, na doso alabhantiyā;
tika-vin10t2:1245: Iccevaṃ pana nikkhitte, dhure pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1254: Pasākhe pana sañjātaṃ, gaṇḍaṃ rucitameva vā;
tika-vin10t2:1255: Anāpucchāva saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ ekena ekikā.
tika-vin10t2:1258: Katesu dukkaṭāniccha, tassā pācittiyo cha ca.
tika-vin10t2:1260: ‘‘Yamettha atthi kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t2:1261: Āṇāpeti sace evaṃ, so ca sabbaṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t2:1263: Ekāya pana vācāya, dukkaṭāni panaccha ca;
tika-vin10t2:1266: Bhedanādīsu ekaṃ sā, āṇāpeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t2:1267: So karoti ca sabbāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1269: Āpucchitvāpi vā viññuṃ, gahetvā dutiyampi vā;
tika-vin10t2:1281: Tathā gabbhinisaññāya, na ca gabbhiniyā pana.
tika-vin10t2:1290: Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1295: Dve vassāni siyāpatti, vuṭṭhāpeyya sace pana.
tika-vin10t2:1300: Chasu sikkhitasikkhaṃ yā, dve vassāni akhaṇḍato;
tika-vin10t2:1303: Imā hi cha ca sikkhāyo, saṭṭhivassāpi ce pana;
tika-vin10t2:1304: Pabbajjāya padātabbā, adatvā na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t2:1307: Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ, idha saṅghena sammataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1314: Paṭhamena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, catutthaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1321: Asesena ca sesaṃ tu, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1325: Sattamampi tathā sabbaṃ, catutthena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1329: Vuttaṃ tena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ na visesatā.
tika-vin10t2:1332: Dve vassāni ca yā kāci, vuṭṭhāpitapavattiniṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1345: Vuṭṭhāpetvā tu yā kāci, bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1346: Taṃ gahetvā na gaccheyya, na caññaṃ āṇāpeyya ce.
tika-vin10t2:1359: Yā mahūpapadā dve tu, sikkhamānā panādito;
tika-vin10t2:1362: Sace gihigatā honti, na ca vā purisaṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t2:1366: Vattabbā panubhopetā, evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t2:1371: Yā aṭṭhārasavassā tu, tato paṭṭhāya sā pana;
tika-vin10t2:1388: Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthaṃ pañcamampi ca;
tika-vin10t2:1399: Laddhe ca cīvare pacchā, asante antarāyike;
tika-vin10t2:1416: Mātarā pitarā vātha, nānuññātaṃ tu sāminā;
tika-vin10t2:1420: Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ tu, bhikkhunīhi, na bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t2:1436: Dvādase terase vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t2:1445: Divasampi ca dhāreti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t2:1448: Chattameva ca dhārentī, yadi gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1454: Puna dhārentiyā tassā, hoti pācittiyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t2:1470: Yā ca dhāreyya saṅghāṇiṃ, yaṃ kiñcipi kaṭūpiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1483: Dhāreti pana yaṃ kiñci, sace sīsūpagādisu;
tika-vin10t2:1484: Tassā tassa ca vatthussa, gaṇanāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1486: Ābādhapaccayā doso, kiñci dhārentiyā na ca;
tika-vin10t2:1496: Sesaṃ tu tatiyeneva, sadisaṃ sabbathā mataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1519: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1524: Vinaye ca katokāsaṃ, suttaṃ pucchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t2:1533: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t2:1536: Yassā saṃkaccikaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acchinnaṃ vāpi kenaci;
tika-vin10t2:1546: Agilānā sace sappiṃ, laddhaṃ viññattiyā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t2:1563: Bhuñjantiyā tu viññatvā, aṭṭhasupi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t2:1567: Sekhiyā pana ye dhammā, uddiṭṭhā pañcasattati;
tika-vin10t2:1581: Suṇanti vinaye hi te ye hite;
